root.name: It's Mr. Pants
root.description: The game was originally going to be a Donkey Kong title known as Coconut Crackers, but after Rare was purchased by Microsoft, the game was radically changed. Gameplay involves using various colored shapes to make squares and rectangles larger than 2x2 of that same color. After the level is completed and all the blocks have dissapeared, the painting is then revealed. Underpants are usually a common theme in all the paintings.
